reviewText: I read the book and loved it, then I bought the tapes in conjunction with a Weight Down class I took. At class I got to watch all the videos, one each week in class and Gwen's materials totally changed my relationship with food. I really got set free from my former love/hate relationship with food.

I loved the book, the Weigh Down Diet, but since I have gotten the series of videos, it just brings the book to life. I would highly recommend these videos, especially for men and women who are home a lot and may not feel too motivated to try weight loss by themselves.
